title: Blackjack
description: Developed a Blackjack game with a team using .NET and C#. Designed and implemented game logic, UI, and features, ensuring robust functionality through thorough testing.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Built a full-stack application using the MERN stack along with jQuery, React, Next.js, HTML5, and Bootstrap. Managed server-side functionality with Express.js, MongoDB Atlas, JSON files, and Passport.

title: Cube Runner Game
description: For an assignment to explore new technologies, I chose Unity Engine and created a Cube Runner game inspired by Tomb Runner. Implemented 3D geometry, physics, and collisions.

title: Student Registration System
description: Created an SQL database and a C# application for a simulated student registration system. Utilized the .NET Framework for efficient database commands and a user-friendly interface.

title: Real Estate Brokerage Application
description: Designed a 3NF star schema data model for a real estate brokerage app. Created an ERD in Visio and documented the model with a detailed report for business users.

title: Car Mechanic Appointment Service
description: Developed a C# application using the .NET framework for a car mechanic appointment service. Prioritized UI/UX best practices and code reusability to create a seamless and efficient user experience.
